Disease.content:

Paragraph: The 1 - yr mortality was significantly higher after aprotinin treatment in the high risk surgery group ( 17 . 7 % vs 9 . 8 % , P = 0 . 034 ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| 1-yr mortality after aprotinin treatment in high risk surgery group |
| 1-yr mortality after aprotinin treatment in low risk surgery group |

The paragraph does not mention any specific diseases, but rather the mortality rates after aprotinin treatment in high and low risk surgery groups.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| 1-yr mortality after aprotinin treatment in high risk surgery group |

The paragraph only mentions the mortality rates after aprotinin treatment in the high risk surgery group, which can be considered a disease outcome. The low risk surgery group and the mortality rate in that group are not separate diseases, but rather contextual information.
